heading: Offbeat Vietnam Sightseeing Tour

itinerary.day1Overview: Upon arrival in Hanoi, check in at the hotel and relax. Spend the day at leisure, exploring the famous attractions like Ngoc Son Temple, Hoan Kiem Lake, Temple of Literature, etc. Afterwards, return to the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day2Overview: Enjoy a trip to Ninh Binh City. Visit the Hao Lu and the ancient temples of the Le Dinh Dynasties. Explore the limestone caves of Tam Coc on a boat ride from Hao Lu. Conclude your day cycling through the village, from Tam Coc to Bich Dong Pagoda. Later, get dropped off at your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day3Overview: You will make your way to Tuan Chau Harbor via the Red River Delta area and board your overnight cruise. Enjoy a warm welcome and relax for a while. Later, you will visit Ti Top island, pearl farm village, and attend a cooking session on board. Enjoy your overnight cruise stay.

itinerary.day4Heading: Halong Bay to Hanoi | Transfer to Dong Hoi
itinerary.day4Overview: Begin the day with a Tai Chi lesson at the deck. Later explore the wonderful caves around Halong Bay before getting transferred to Hanoi airport from Tuan Chau Harbor. Board your flight to Dong Hoi, and after arrival get transferred to the hotel for check in and overnight stay.

itinerary.day5Heading: Excursion to Phong Nha Ke Bang National Park
itinerary.day5Overview: In the morning you will be taken to the Phong Nha Ke Bang National park for a day trip exploring the best caves in Vietnam. Visit the Dark Cave, Phong Nha Cave, and get a chance to enjoy kayaking, flying swing, and more before you get dropped off at the hotel in Dong Hoi for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day6Overview: Check out of your hotel in Dong Hoi before getting transferred to the Dong Hoi train station. You will board a train for Da Nang, enjoying a 6 hour journey across scenic forest routes. Upon arrival in Da Nang, check in at the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day7Overview: Get transferred to Suoi Mo Station to board a cable car to Ba Na Hills. Visit the famous Golden Hand Bridge, renowned for scenes in “Game of Thrones”. End your trip by visiting Linh Ung Pagoda, housing a Lady Buddha & Debay Wine Cellar. Afterwards, get transferred back to the hotel in Da Nang.

itinerary.day8Heading: Da Nang to Ho Chi Minh | Visit to Cu Chi Tunnels
itinerary.day8Overview: Check out and get transferred to the airport for a flight to Ho Chi Minh City. After arrival, check in at the hotel and get ready for a half day tour of Cu Chi tunnels post lunch time. Explore the Vietnam war period tunnels and later get dropped at the hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day9Heading: Departure from Ho Chi Minh City
itinerary.day9Overview: Check out from the hotel and get transferred to the Ho Chi Minh airport for your flight back home. This marks the end of your trip to Vietnam.

overView.heading: Unveiling the Enchanting Wonders of Vietnam
overView.text: Embark on an extraordinary journey through Vietnam, a captivating land where ancient traditions harmoniously blend with modern splendor. Discover a kaleidoscope of cultural riches, breathtaking landscapes, and warm hospitality that will leave an indelible mark on your soul.

overView.heading: Imperial Cities and Ancient Legends
overView.text: Immerse yourself in the imperial grandeur of Vietnam's historic cities. Wander through the UNESCO-listed Citadel of Hue, unravel the mysteries of Hoi An's ancient town, and stand in awe before the majestic temples and pagodas that echo stories of dynasties past.

overView.heading: Natural Wonders and Coastal Splendor
overView.text: Vietnam's natural beauty takes center stage in its stunning landscapes. Cruise along the emerald waters of Halong Bay, where limestone karsts rise majestically from the sea. Explore picturesque beaches, lush national parks, and verdant rice terraces that paint a vivid tapestry of natural grandeur.

overView.heading: Vibrant Cities and Culinary Delights
overView.text: Discover the pulsating energy of Vietnam's vibrant cities. Explore the bustling streets of Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City, where modern skyscrapers coexist with ancient temples. Indulge in the country's renowned cuisine, a harmonious blend of fresh ingredients and aromatic spices that tantalize the senses.

overView.heading: Craftsmanship and Cultural Immersion
overView.text: Delve into the rich tapestry of Vietnamese culture through its craftsmanship and traditions. Witness the intricate art of water puppetry, admire the skilled hands of artisans creating lacquerware and silk paintings, and immerse yourself in the warmth of local hospitality.

overView.heading: A Journey of Resilience and Renewal
overView.text: Vietnam's history is a testament to resilience and renewal. From the Cu Chi Tunnels that bear witness to the country's struggles, to the thriving cities that showcase its remarkable progress, Vietnam's spirit is one of enduring strength and unwavering determination.

overView.heading: Plan Your Vietnamese Odyssey
overView.text: Whether you seek ancient wonders, natural beauty, or cultural immersion, Vietnam promises an unforgettable journey. Embark on your odyssey through this captivating land, where every experience is a tapestry woven with timeless traditions and modern wonders.
